group_1.narration: It's been a while since the last battle, @and my wounds have been healing, slowly but steadily.
Even now, I'm always thinking about defeating Yuna. @I don't like the idea of Torayamachi ruling all of Futatsugi.
If you still haven't decided between Torayamachi or @Ryugasaki, I have one last thing to tell you, @if you'll come to listen.
I'm not trying to gather you all in one @place so I can kill you all. I mean, I still haven't @recovered enough to take you all on, so don't worry about that.

group_1.textLeft: Looks like Juri sent that message to everyone...

group_1.textRight: I'll bet Torayamachi has approached us all.
What are you guys going to do, though?...

group_1.textLeft: Let's not talk about that here. It's a very sensitive @topic.
We're all here because, we're willing to follow Juri, @or we can't decide who to work with.
Let's go.

group_1.textCenter: That's a lot more than I expected... @Oh man...

group_1.textRight: You're the one that called us over...

group_1.textCenter: Well yeah, but I thought you guys had given up @on me.

group_1.textLeft: If we had, we wouldn't be here now.
You said it in your message, didn't you?
That if we hadn't decided between the gangs, @you had one last thing to tell us.

group_1.textCenter: So, what do you have to say to us?
Are you going to tell us to stop being stubborn and @just go join Torayamachi?

group_1.textLeft: You were right.

group_1.textRight: What are you two talking about?

group_1.textLeft: Never mind. What I have to say is real simple.
Let's come together as Ryuugasaki again and wreck Torayamachi.

group_1.textRight: Are you out of your mind...?
I can't believe you're suggesting that after they just destroyed us.

group_1.textLeft: Despite all that, you still can't decide who to work @with, and that's why you're here now, right?
Torayamachi or Ryuugasaki.
Honestly, since Yuna's got her guard down now, @it's the perfect time to strike.
Yeah, we can turn the tables on them.
And Juri the Great can drag Yuna out in front of her.
It sounds like just another chance for you to thin out the competition.

group_1.textRight: Torayamachi's proved that witches have been returning.
We investigated with them and found out that there @are as many witches now as there were before.
So I think we could work with them under the right conditions.

group_1.textLeft: So what caused the witches to disappear in the first place?
That's a bunch of bull.
What if they stop showing up again? Are we going to @kill each other again?

group_1.textRight: .. Maybe we can live in peace until then.

group_1.textLeft: And what happens after that? You might end up @getting killed.
It's now or never. We've got to do it.
We can reverse the situation with as little bloodshed @as possible.

group_1.textCenter: We have a meeting planned with Yuna to discuss the terms of our cooperation, so...
I really don't like doing it this way...
But if I can fight Yuna again, I don't have a choice.

group_1.narration: You can kill the other girls, but leave Yuna alive.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, Juri the Great is going to let her wounds heal and wait for the right time.

group_1.textRight: There's a chance Ao might show up at the meeting as well, isn't there...?

group_1.textLeft: You're the only one who can stop that from @happening.
You've got to tell her what you want to tell her.
